  • Method Details

    • saveOntologyAndPatterns

      public void saveOntologyAndPatterns(@Nullable org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile ontologyFile, @NonNull List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> patternsFiles, @NonNull TransformationInput input)
      Saves ontology and patterns for transformation.

      If the ontology file is provided, it takes precedence over the URL from which it is to be loaded specified in input.

      Patterns are loaded both from the specified files and from the URLs specified in input.

      Parameters:
      ontologyFile - File containing the source ontology, optional
      patternsFiles - List of files containing transformation patterns, possibly empty
      input - Object specifying URLs of ontology and patterns to download

    • saveOntologyAndPatterns

      public void saveOntologyAndPatterns(@NonNull TransformationInput input)
      Saves ontology and patterns which are specified as URL from which they are to be loaded.
      Parameters:
      input - Transformation input specifying ontology and pattern urls

      Throws:
